curam.util.jmx
Class CuramJMXUtil

java.lang.Object
  curam.util.jmx.CuramJMXUtil

public final class CuramJMXUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of useful methods to use when dealing with the JMX infrastructure.

Method Detail

isJmxMonitoringEnabled

public static boolean isJmxMonitoringEnabled()
Use this class to check that the JMX monitoring is enabled in instrumented code. Proceed with the instrumentation only if this method return true.

Returns:
whether or not the JMX monitoring is enabled

runAndRecord

public static <T> T runAndRecord(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> run,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String username)
                      throws CuramJMXUtil.CallableException
Invoke this method to execute the code in the Callable in a manner that will capture and record the execution statistics in all suitable JMX services such as transaction tracing and in-flight data collection.

Note that any non runtime exception that is thrown by the Callable method is converted to a CuramJMXUtil.CallableException. Invoke Throwable.getCause() to retrieve the original exception.

Type Parameters:
T - the return type of the Callable
Parameters:
run - the Callable to execute
name - the name of the processing as it will appear in the JMX services (transaction tracing, in-flight data...)
username - the username of the Curam user on behalf of which this code is executed
Returns:
the result of invoking the Callable Callable.call() method
Throws:
CuramJMXUtil.CallableException - wraps any non runtime exception caused by the execution of the Callable.call() method

getTracingData

public static java.lang.String getTracingData()
Return the tracing data.

Returns:
the tracing data from InFlightCollector.
